data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 36,700 souls in Sonbhadra and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sonbhadra, Uttar Pradesh, India

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Sonbhadra, Uttar Pradesh, India that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Sonbhadra, Uttar Pradesh, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Sonbhadra, Uttar Pradesh, India not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Gond Singhrolia people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Sonbhadra who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Lord, let it be said of the 36,296 lost in Sonbhadra that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.section_summary:
the county of Sonbhadra, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 36,700.

We estimate Sonbhadra has 404 people who might know Jesus, 445 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 35,851 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 404 believers in the county of Sonbhadra into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;
